trans-unit.source: Defines an area within which you can explicitly position child elements by using coordinates that are relative to the Canvas area.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个区域，在其中你可以显式方式来定位子元素使用相对于画布区域的坐标。

trans-unit.source: A Canvas contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个画布中包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象，后者是在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Canvas is the only panel element that has no inherent layout characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 画布是具有任何固有布局特性的唯一面板元素。

trans-unit.source: A Canvas has default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties of zero, unless it is the child of an element that automatically sizes its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 在画布上具有默认<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>属性均为零，除非它是元素的子级的自动调整大小及其子元素。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child elements of a Canvas are never resized, they are just positioned at their designated coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的画布从不会调整大小，它们只位于指定的坐标处。

trans-unit.source: This provides flexibility for situations in which inherent sizing constraints or alignment are not needed or wanted.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了灵活性对于中的固有的大小约束或对齐方式的情况不需要或不想。

trans-unit.source: For cases in which you want child content to be automatically resized and aligned, it is usually best to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> element.
trans-unit.target: 对于要在其中自动调整大小和对齐的子内容的情况下，它是通常最好使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> property determines the order in which child elements that share the same coordinate space appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>属性确定共享相同的坐标空间的子元素出现的顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A higher <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> value for one child element indicates that this element will appear above another child element that has a lower value.
trans-unit.target: 更高<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>一个子元素的值，该值指示此元素将显示另一个具有较低的值的子元素的上方。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify them, the attached properties <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> take priority over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定这些属性，附加属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>将优先于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child elements of a Canvas are always given the full size that they desire.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的画布总是会获得他们所需的完整大小。

trans-unit.source: As a result, vertical alignment and horizontal alignment have no effect inside a Canvas.
trans-unit.target: 因此，垂直对齐方式和水平对齐方式具有在画布内的不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Canvas is a top-level layout control that you can use for absolute positioning of child content.
trans-unit.target: 画布是你可以使用绝对定位的子内容的顶级布局控件。

trans-unit.source: For painting and drawing, you use brushes and do not have to use a Canvas.
trans-unit.target: 对于绘画和绘图，你将使用画笔，且不需要使用一个画布。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用纯色和渐变概述绘制](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, panel elements do not receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，面板元素不会收到焦点。

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制要接收焦点的面板元素，将设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 排列的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref> element should use to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 大小此<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref>应使用元素排列其子元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref> element and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>表示的排列的大小的这<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref>元素及其子代。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加属性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property for a given dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加给定的依赖对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The element from which the property value is read.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取属性值的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coordinate of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>坐标指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clipping geometry that indicates the area that will be clipped if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示将时要剪辑的区域的剪辑几何图形<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: The available size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the area that is clipped if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> ，它表示如果剪辑区域<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property for a given dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加给定的依赖对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The element from which the property value is read.

trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>坐标指定的元素。

trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>坐标指定的元素。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加属性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref> in anticipation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量的子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Canvas"></xref>预期在以后排列它们期间<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.ArrangeOverride*>都会通过。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 上限<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>不应超过。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>表示排列子内容所需的大小。
